aboutAppText:
This app is a fun social drinking game designed to bring friends together for laughter, challenges, and great memories!

Important: This game does not encourage irresponsible drinking or underage alcohol consumption. Please always respect the legal drinking age in your location.

Prefer not to drink alcohol? No problem, substitute with non-alcoholic beverages and enjoy the game just as much.

Play responsibly, have fun, and make every moment count! ðŸŽ‰
